meanings.definition: To lift or move to a higher position
meanings.sent1: She is raising her hand to ask a question.
meanings.sent2: The sun is raising in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The magician is raising a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The crane is raising the heavy load effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The elevator is raising us to the top floor.

meanings.definition: To increase in amount or level
meanings.sent1: He is raising his grades by studying hard.
meanings.sent2: The company is raising the prices of their products.
meanings.sent3: The chef is raising the heat to make the dish spicier.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is raising the difficulty level of the test.
meanings.sent5: The farmer is raising more crops this year.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing up or nurturing
meanings.sent1: Parenting involves the raising of children.
meanings.sent2: The raising of a pet requires love and care.
meanings.sent3: The raising of a plant from a seed is a rewarding process.
meanings.sent4: The raising of a family is a fulfilling experience.
meanings.sent5: The raising of awareness about a cause is important.

meanings.definition: The act of constructing or building
meanings.sent1: The raising of a new house in the neighborhood is exciting.
meanings.sent2: The raising of a skyscraper requires careful planning.
meanings.sent3: The raising of a barn in the countryside is a community effort.
meanings.sent4: The raising of a bridge over the river is a major project.
meanings.sent5: The raising of a fence around the garden is necessary for protection.

meanings.definition: The act of causing something to occur or exist
meanings.sent1: The raising of suspicions led to an investigation.
meanings.sent2: The raising of funds for charity is a noble cause.
meanings.sent3: The raising of a question sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: The raising of an issue brought attention to an important matter.
meanings.sent5: The raising of an alarm alerted everyone to the danger.
